entry.title: Climax® Kegels Ben Wa Balls with Silicone Strap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Climax
Type: Beads, Bullets and Balls
Price: 9.63

Product Description:
  • Beautiful solid glass Ben Wa Balls with nonporous silicone strap
  • Silicone strap makes them easy to insert and remove
  • Silicone and glass can be run under hot or cold water delivering sexy chills or hot thrills
  • Boil or place on the top rack of the dishwasher; easy to clean
  • Silicone's soft texture becomes slick when lubricated
  • Silicone is durable, nonporous and can last a lifetime
  • Waterproof so you can enjoy them anywhere
  • Phthalate free
